data: Mr. Asherill | Mr. Swanland | Archibald Mortomley

If any person ever questioned the wisdom of Mr. Asherill in taking for his partner that perfect gentleman Mr. Swanland, his doubts must have been dispelled had he chanced to be present at the meeting of creditorsâ€”_re_ Archibald Mortomley.
